name: bj-ccssccbar

body.origin:
|- wss(cc, cccbar)
-| wss(cc, cun(cc, cccinfty))
-| wceq(cccbar, cun(cc, cccinfty))
body.pretty:
⊢ ℂ ⊆ CCbar
⊣ ℂ ⊆(ℂ ⋃ CCinfty)
⊣ CCbar =(ℂ ⋃ CCinfty)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cc, cccbar)
-| wss(cc, cun(cc, cccinfty))
-| wceq(cccbar, cun(cc, cccinfty))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ℂ ⊆ CCbar
⊣ ℂ ⊆(ℂ ⋃ CCinfty)
⊣ CCbar =(ℂ ⋃ CCinfty)

comment: Complex numbers are extended complex numbers. (Contributed by BJ, 27-Jun-2019.)
